named-query.name: findTopLevelResourceByUser
named-query.query: select _resource from Resource _resource inner join _resource.roles _role inner join _role.identities _identity where _resource.level=1 and _identity.userAccount = ? order by _resource.sortOrder asc,_resource.name asc

named-query.name: findResourceByParentId
named-query.query: select _resource from Resource _resource inner join _resource.parents _parent where _parent.id = ? order by _resource.sortOrder asc
